hero.name: I'm Yvan Dumas
hero.state: Engineering student in Computer Science at Polytech Lyon.
hero.internship: Looking for a 5-month internship abroad, starting in September 2026.

about.title: About
about.description: I am a Computer Science engineering student at Polytech Lyon, passionate about new technologies and IT. I also enjoy 3D modeling. Beyond coding, I love sport. I am a black belt in karate and a volleyball player. These sports have taught me the discipline and team spirit that I bring to my technical projects. I am also a huge fan of Formula 1. I am currently seeking a 5-month internship abroad starting in September 2026 to develop my skills within an international team.
